activity.text: Does "duplicate" mean the issue has already been raised before? If yes, has it been resolved? If not, I would like to work on it.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11530
activity.text: Hi @Tanuj1718, Is this bug still active? I believe I‚Äôve resolved the issue. The root cause was that when submitting, some questionnaire forms were not sending any data to the backend. The problem was in `QuestionnaireForm.tsx`, where we need to check the data before adding it to the request.push. Currently, we're checking the length of `nonStructuredResponses`, but since we're applying a filter and map, the filter might result in an empty array. We need to validate the data before proceeding. Once we stop invalid data from being sent, the rest of the process, including error handling through `Notification`, will work as expected. I‚Äôve tested this locally, and it seems to be working fine now. üìù**Suggestions** * Now, I was able to stop the couldn't find the resources But, * When we tried to submit the QuestionnaireForm , toast message will be shown like this. * Here I don't think toast message is not in proper form. We've to handle this case in `Notification.tsx`. We've to display a proper message rathter than just displaying Failed to submit Questionnaire. * Please Let me know
